Thank you so much I have been waiting for this movie for a long time! Is there any way you can upload a torrent of the blu ray extra features? There is a half hour of deleted scenes. Thank you sos much for all of your torrents, you are my favorite up loader!!
Rip is not very good. Can't expect a lot at this size, but I've seen better. In blank backgrounds, you can see ghost images forming and reforming throughout the entire movie. 7/10. Thanks.
